scenariodescription: The robot is transporting boxes through the Passageways in the warehouse. As it takes a turn at a blind corner intersection, it encounters a human worker. The human only notices the robot when it's very close and stops completely until the robot is no longer blocking its path. The encounter happens near Rack A and Packaging Area 1, at an intersection of Passageways.

humanbehavior.Human 1: Human 1 is walking along the passageway near Rack A towards Packaging Area 1 when they suddenly encounter the robot at the blind corner. Human 1 stops immediately upon seeing the robot very close and waits until the robot moves out of the way before continuing to walk.

expectedrobotbehavior: The robot should detect the human upon turning the corner and stop immediately. It should then back up slightly to unblock the human's path, wait for the human to proceed, and then continue transporting the boxes towards its destination.
